summary.span: 使用此命名空間中的類別以提供計數器資料。

span.span: Use the classes in this namespace to provide counter data.

summary.span: 計數器是用來向取用者公開效能指標，例如效能監視器。

span.span: The counters are used to expose performance metrics to consumers such as the Performance Monitor.

summary.span: 命名空間未包含取用計數器資料的類別。

span.span: The namespace does not contain classes for consuming the counter data.

summary.span: 如需效能計數器架構的完整說明，請參閱效能計數器.aspx)。

span.span: For a complete description of the performance counters architecture, see Performance Counters.aspx).
